message:
Did anyone see JottIt before? I wish I can find something as easy, but hosted

It was created many years ago by Aaron Swartz

description: The Camtasia Studio video content presented here requires JavaScript to be enabled and the latest version of the Macromedia Flash Player. If you are you using a browser with JavaScript disabled please enable it now. Otherwise, please update your version of the free Flash Player by downloading here.

data.message: let me know if you need a coupon or something :)
Is there something that I can host myself?
yes you can sync the files to your cpanel, dropbox or even google drive.
